title: TechFest 2025
description: Annual technical festival showcasing innovation and creativity in technology. Join us for exciting competitions, workshops, and tech talks.
longDescription: TechFest 2024 is our flagship technical event featuring coding competitions, robotics challenges, AI workshops, and keynote speeches from industry leaders. Over 500 students participate in various technical competitions.

title: Academic Symposium
description: Research presentations, paper submissions, and academic discussions across various disciplines.
longDescription: Platform for students and faculty to present research papers, participate in academic discussions, and network with peers from different institutions.

title: Afrobeat Music Festival
description: A vibrant celebration of Afrobeat with live performances, dance, and cultural showcases.
longDescription: Experience the electrifying rhythms of Afrobeat at this grand festival. The event will feature top Afrobeat artists, DJs, cultural dance troupes, and food vendors celebrating African heritage. It's a night of music, dance, and unity under the stars.

title: Sports Championship
description: Inter-departmental sports competition featuring cricket, football, basketball, and athletics.
longDescription: Annual sports championship promoting fitness and team spirit among students. Competitions include indoor and outdoor sports with prizes for winners in each category.

title: Cultural Extravaganza
description: A vibrant celebration of arts, music, and cultural diversity with performances from students across all departments.
longDescription: Our annual cultural fest brings together talented students for an evening of music, dance, drama, and art exhibitions. Experience the rich cultural heritage through student performances.

title: Entrepreneurship Workshop
description: Interactive workshop on startup fundamentals, pitch presentations, and business plan development.
longDescription: Learn from successful entrepreneurs and industry experts about starting your own business. Includes hands-on activities, networking sessions, and mentorship opportunities.
